Books & Magazines
The Republic of Plastic Beach Passport

Release date: 15th May 2010

This booklet was a free gift in an issue of NME, establishing what had happened to the band between phases 2 & 3. The book also includes a (now-defunct) weblink to Superfast Jellyfish (Mighty Mouse Remix) & an AR code for the Gorillaz Plastic Beach app.

Escape to Plastic Beach World Tour 2010 Programme

Release date: 3rd October 2010

This tour programme was made for the Escape to Plastic Beach World Tour and includes all the tour dates, Phase 3 artwork, photos of 2010 live performances prior & credits for the tour. Also included is a booklet with art & all the band’s lore from Phase 3 (ending at the tour).

Booklet sections:

“Of Plastic Beaches, Gorillaz and Gas Attacks…” A Synthetic Snapshot…So Far
The Harlem Apollo – New York City
Running Gun Blues
An Escape…to Plastic Beach
An Album in the Making
Cyborgs in the Closet
Life’s a Gas
A Pirate’s Broadcast
Stylo – Terror on the Murder Mile
Russel’s Rumoured Return
Plastic Beach Sets Sail
The Coachella Incident – 18th April 2010
The Camden Roundhouse – April 29th & 30th 2010
Trouble Below Decks: The O2 Walk Through
It’s Enough to Put Your Back Out
The Girl in the Cat Mask
Glastonbury Festival 25th June 2010 – A Big Field in Somerset
Up on Melancholy Hill
The Arabian Nights
Escape to Plastic Beach World Tour 2010
